name: Howard Behr
text: Worked with Vimal over the past year as he did the QA for my startup's software development. He always did a great job both identifying the key issues and concerns while also proposing improvements that would enhance the end user's experience. I also appreciated that he was easy to work with, a strong and positive contributor during those tough meetings and discussions when it would have been less productive if he (or other team members) had been too combative.

name: Jo Cavill
text: I have found Vimal to be very creative and diligent in his work. Not only is he a very thorough tester, but he also goes above and beyond his duties to provide useful suggestions and feedback to help the team continually improve the product. I would highly recommend Vimal to anyone looking for a multi-skilled tester.
